channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 17:22 Driven Alarm to Chernihiv Oblast. Since Further Messages.
item.description: 游릭 17:22 Driven Alarm to Chernihiv Oblast. Since Further Messages.#Chernihiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 17:19 Drawing of anxiety in Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lazype territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community
